item.title: Resident Evil Ends Five-Year Streak with No New Game in 2024
item.description: No new Resident Evil game in 2024, ending a five-year streak of annual releases.

item.title: Halloween Gaming Sale: Save Up to 90% on Popular Titles
item.description: Up to 90% off on popular games like Resident Evil 4 Remake and Alien: Isolation across PS5, PS4, Xbox, and Steam.
